    Interface and Description
    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.Id3MetadataListener

    com.brightcove.player.controller.ExoPlayerSourceSelectionController
    Instead of subclassing DefaultSourceSelectionController, please create your customized SourceSelector and use it to construct the DefaultSourceSelectionController with DefaultSourceSelectionController.createWithSourceSelector(EventEmitter, SourceSelector)

    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastEventType.SET_CAST_BUTTON
    No longer used to set the Cast button. For more information on how to set the Cast button in your application, please visit: MediaRouteActionProvider reference
    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastEventType.SET_MINI_CONTROLLER
    No longer used to set the MiniController. For more information on how to set the MiniController in your application, please visit: MiniControllerFragment reference
    com.brightcove.cast.GoogleCastEventType.SET_NOTIFICATIONS
    No longer used to set the notifications.

    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onDecoderInitialized(AnalyticsListener.EventTime, int, String, long)
    Use ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onAudioDecoderInitialized(com.google.android.exoplayer2.analytics.AnalyticsListener.EventTime, java.lang.String, long) and ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onVideoDecoderInitialized(com.google.android.exoplayer2.analytics.AnalyticsListener.EventTime, java.lang.String, long) * instead.
    com.brightcove.player.display.ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onDecoderInitialized(String, long, long)
    Use ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onAudioDecoderInitialized(com.google.android.exoplayer2.analytics.AnalyticsListener.EventTime, java.lang.String, long) and ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent.InfoListener.onVideoDecoderInitialized(com.google.android.exoplayer2.analytics.AnalyticsListener.EventTime, java.lang.String, long)

    Constructor and Description

    Please use Catalog.Builder to create the Catalog.
    com.brightcove.player.model.CuePoint(CuePoint.PositionType, String, Map<String, Object>)
    Use the construtor that use a CuePointType rather than a string. This will guarantee that the CuePoint is of a known type and can be handled properly by the system. This method now throws IllegalArgumentException if the string value describing the cue point type does not specify a known cue point type. Currently supported values are "AD" or "CODE".
    com.brightcove.player.model.CuePoint(int, CuePoint.CuePointType, Map<String, Object>)
    com.brightcove.player.model.CuePoint(int, String, Map<String, Object>)
    Use the construtor that takes a CuePointType rather than a string. This will guarantee that the CuePoint is of a known type and can be handled properly by the system. This method now throws IllegalArgumentException if the string value describing the cue point type does not specify a known cue point type. Currently supported values are "AD" and "CODE".
    com.brightcove.player.drm.ExoPlayerDrmSessionManager(UUID, ExoMediaDrm.Provider, MediaDrmCallback, HashMap<String, String>)
    com.brightcove.freewheel.controller.FreeWheelController(Activity, SurfaceView, EventEmitter)
